name: Jerry Hope
description: am single and am looking for honest woman and i have 1 daughter and i want to be happy again. Am looking forward to meeting my special woman. I would like he to be kind, attentive, caring, reliable, well-mannered man with a good sense of humor.he should be serious in his intentions to find a right woman and create a happy family. I would like he to appreciate not only my appearance but my inside world as well. he should also be goal-oriented, self-established, not greedy and narrow-minded. he should know how to treat a woman. he should love children. I like a woman that is honest, humble, loyal, loving and caring, easily going. Trust worth. Dependable… respectful. Open minded… A man that will always be with me in bad times.and good time
